      • sendEmail

        public boolean sendEmail(java.lang.String subject,
                java.util.List<java.lang.String> recipients,
                java.lang.String body,
                boolean format)
                  throws javax.mail.MessagingException
        Sends an email with the specified subject, body, and format to the recipients
        Parameters:
        subject - Title of the message
        recipients - A list of addresses to send the message to
        body - The body of the message
        format - A boolean flag that toggles plain text or HTML emails
        Returns:
        boolean indicating success or failure
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException
